title: Russia sets coal mining, new energy ambition in India
description: Russia is aiming to boost coal mining projects and energy collaboration in India, leveraging its significant coal resources amid global shortages. Alexander Novak highlighted potential areas like mining, processing, marketing, and power generation. Russia also leads in oil supply to India, with significant engagement at the Russian Energy Week Forum attended by over 5,300 participants.
